pojo-deployment.properties:
# swagger brings back jackson*, maybe not what you want in your app cxf.jaxrs.skip-provider-scanning = true
# swagger activation cxf.jaxrs.features = swagger2
# jackson is there so we use it but default TomEE provider is johnzon and good as well cxf.jaxrs.providers = com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider
